application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1) Cherry ( Prunus spp) OS No.11. Reduce back to previous reduction points; light thinT2) Crab Apple OS No.12. Reduce crown sides; light crown thin. T3) Cherry (Prunus spp) OS No. 13. Reduce crown sides; light thinT4-17 are all situated on the grass area closest to the old cake factoryT4) Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus). Re-reduce crown to previous pruning points. T5)Cherry (Prunus spp). Crown lift; light thinRe-reduce crown on all following (T6-T17) to previous pruning points:T6) Crab Apple; T7) Crab Apple; T8) Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus); T9) Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus)T10) Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus); T11) Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus);T15) Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus)T16) Norway Maplem (Acer platanoides); T17) Norway Maple (Acer platanoides)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
